ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from saving records with Payment Type = Warranty and a PAC Late Payment Record Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name='PAC Late Payment Record Type', NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Type__c,'Warranty') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Payment Type cannot equal Warranty for records with the PAC Late Payment Record Type.
